title: The Housemaid
description: A live-in housemaid's seemingly perfect job hides dark secrets in this gripping psychological thriller.

title: Funny Story
description: A woman and her ex-fiancé's new fiancée's ex become unlikely roommates, leading to unexpected connections.

title: The Women
description: A novel about a young woman who joins the Army Nurse Corps and serves in Vietnam.

title: It Ends with Us
description: A novel exploring the complexities of love, resilience, and breaking cycles of abuse.

title: Lessons in Chemistry
description: In the 1960s, a female chemist becomes the star of a cooking show, teaching more than just recipes.

title: James
description: A Pulitzer Prize-winning retelling of 'Adventures of Huckleberry Finn' from the perspective of the enslaved Jim.

title: Intermezzo
description: Follows two brothers navigating grief, love, and their complex relationship after their father's death.

title: Fourth Wing
description: A young woman is forced to join a war college for dragon riders in a brutal, high-stakes fantasy world.

title: The Thursday Murder Club
description: Four friends in a retirement village investigate unsolved murders for fun, until a real case lands on their doorstep.

title: A Court of Thorns and Roses
description: A huntress is dragged into a magical realm to live with a captor, only to find her feelings for him evolving.

title: Atomic Habits
description: A practical guide on how to build good habits and break bad ones through tiny, easy changes.

title: Daisy Jones & The Six
description: The rise and fall of a legendary 1970s rock band, told in a series of interviews.

title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
description: A reclusive Hollywood legend reveals the shocking truths of her glamorous and scandalous life to an unknown journalist.

title: The Extremely Embarrassing Life of Lottie Brooks
description: Lottie starts secondary school and chronicles brilliantly awkward mishaps, friendships, and crushes.

title: The Catastrophic Friendship Fails of Lottie Brooks
description: Spring term brings drama on stage and off as Lottie tries to rescue fraying friendships.

title: The Mega-Complicated Crushes of Lottie Brooks
description: Holiday highs and heart-thumps as Lottie navigates first boyfriends and mega-crushes.

title: Lottie Brooks's Totally Disastrous School-Trip
description: A school trip spirals into hilarious chaos, tests, and triumphs for Lottie and friends.

title: The Completely Chaotic Christmas of Lottie Brooks
description: Festive mayhem, family visitors, and elf-related disasters make for a very Lottie Christmas.

title: The Majorly Awkward BFF Dramas of Lottie Brooks
description: New boyfriend, new dog, and not enough time—Lottie struggles to keep her BFFs happy.

title: The Hate U Give
description: A teen witnesses a shooting and finds her voice while navigating community, justice, and identity.

title: One of Us Is Lying
description: Five students walk into detention; only four walk out, and secrets unravel in a twisty mystery.

title: They Both Die at the End
description: Two boys meet on their End Day and choose how to truly live in the time they have left.

title: Six of Crows
description: A crew of outcasts attempts an impossible heist in a gritty fantasy underworld.

title: The Cruel Prince
description: A mortal girl schemes for power at a treacherous High Court of Faerie.

title: A Good Girl's Guide to Murder
description: A student’s school project reopens a closed case everyone thought was solved.

title: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes
description: A young Coriolanus Snow mentors a tribute and confronts the origins of the Games.

title: Dork Diaries: Tales from a Not-So-Fabulous Life
description: Nikki Maxwell’s illustrated diary of middle-school crushes, mean girls, and epic mishaps.

title: The Brilliant World of Tom Gates
description: Tom’s doodle-filled school life: bands, excuses, and laugh-out-loud everyday chaos.

title: Geek Girl
description: Harriet Manners, certified geek, gets scouted into fashion and life gets complicated.

title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
description: Rule-breaking challenges and real-life hurdles make Rafe’s first year unforgettable.

title: Amari and the Night Brothers
description: A determined girl enters a secret Bureau of Supernatural Affairs to find her missing brother.

title: The Wild Robot
description: A robot washes ashore on a remote island and learns to live among wild animals.

title: The Girl Who Drank the Moon
description: A girl accidentally enmagicked must learn to harness her power and heal a divided town.

title: Refugee
description: Three young refugees in different eras face perilous journeys toward hope.

title: Front Desk
description: A Chinese American girl manages a motel front desk while helping immigrant families.

title: Ghost
description: A boy with a troubled past finds purpose on a track team.

title: Wonder
description: A boy with a facial difference starts school and teaches his community empathy.

title: The Hunger Games
description: Katniss Everdeen volunteers as tribute in a deadly televised competition to save her sister.

title: The Book Thief
description: In Nazi Germany, a young girl finds solace in books and the people around her.

title: The Little Prince
description: An aviator meets a little prince who tells him about planets, friendship, and love.
